com.adobe.creativesdk.foundation.auth

Interface IAdobeAuthClientCredentials


  • public interface IAdobeAuthClientCredentials
    IAdobeAuthClientCredentials is used to provide application's client credentials.

    Please note that this interface needs to be implemented by a class that extends the global Application object.

    Example usage: 

      
  public class MyApplication extends Application implements IAdobeAuthClientCredentials {
      
      @Override
      public void onCreate() {
          super.onCreate();
          AdobeCSDKFoundation.initializeCSDKFoundation(getApplicationContext());
      }


      @Override
      public String getClientID() {
          return "YOUR_CLIENT_ID";
      }

      @Override
      public String getClientSecret() {
          return "YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET";
      }

      @Override
      public String getAdditionalScopesList() {
          return "ADDITIONAL_SCOPES_IF_YOU_ARE_THIRD_PARTY_APP_ELSE_NULL";
      }


      @Override
      public String getRedirectURI() {
          return "YOUR_REDIRECT_URI_IF_YOU_ARE_THIRD_PARTY_APP_ELSE_NULL";
      }
  }
